description.en: Ta' Qali Park is a large public park in the centre of Malta. It is still used for agriculture, but also for sports, concerts, and other activities.
description.mt: Il-Park ta' Ħal-Tarxien huwa park pubbliku kbir fil-qalba ta' Malta. Huwa għadu użat għall-agrikoltura, iżda wkoll għall-isports, kuncerti, u attivitajiet oħra.

description.en: Valletta is the capital city of Malta. It is a UNESCO World Heritage Site, and is known for its historic buildings, museums, and gardens.
description.mt: Il-Belt Valletta hi l-kapitali ta' Malta. Hi sit tal-Patrimonju Dinji tal-UNESCO, u hija magħrufa għall-bini storiku żgħir, mużewijiet, u ġonna.
